trans-unit.source: Represents data returned from calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer.AdornerHitTest(System.Windows.Point)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 表示呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer.AdornerHitTest(System.Windows.Point)" /> 方法後所傳回的資料。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the visual and point information provided by the base class <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>, this class uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.AdornerHitTestResult.Adorner%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to return the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner> that was hit (since there may be multiple Visuals in a single <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>).
trans-unit.target: 加入視覺效果和基底類別所提供的點資訊<xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>，這個類別會使用的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.AdornerHitTestResult.Adorner%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以傳回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>的已叫用 (因為在單一可能有多個視覺效果<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the visual that was hit.
trans-unit.target: 取得已點擊的視覺項目。

trans-unit.source: There may be multiple visuals in a single <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: 在單一可能有多個視覺效果<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the visual that was actually hit.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回實際點擊的視覺效果。
